title: GitObjectRef
description: Typed reference to a Git object by algorithm and object id (commit/tree/blob/tag). Used in receipts and view commitments; never store symbolic refs like HEAD as the commitment.

algo.description: Hash algorithm used by this repository for object IDs.

object_kind.description: Kind of Git object being referenced.

object_id.description: Hex-encoded Git object ID (lowercase). Length depends on algo.
